Summary Scott is a business and entrepreneurial-minded User Experience Architect, capable of handling a range of UX projects - from building an intranet system to designing for a large scale ecommerce website. With twelve years of experience, he's worked for clients such as Visa, Pepsi, Deloitte, and Warner Brothers. Scott's focus is to create interfaces and products that align with the sustainable business needs of each customer. Scott is an information architect. Through his understanding of business leadership and project management, he balances business needs while motivating success within the product's user interface and focuses on the end user first. Læs mere her:  
https://www.kea.dk/da/uddannelser/multimediedesigner/ Næstved Gymnasium Matematisk student,  Højniveau fag: Historie, dansk, matematik, biologi, samfundsfag , Gymnasiel Uddannelse 2004  – 2007 Gymnasiet er en treårig uddannelse med et grundforløb på ½ år efterfulgt af et studieretningsforløb på 2 ½ år, som vælges af den enkelte elev.  
 
Du kan få et indtryk af, hvordan det er at gå her på skolen, i denne film.

Summary Primeau Barey is a creative and dynamic design studio where client relationships are central. We aim to be partners in your success.  
 
Our mission: creating efficient brand images and communication tools to help you stand out, expand your visibility and that of your organization, its services and its products. 
 
Our specialties: graphic design for print and web, visual identity development, communication tool conception and design, web design, and book design. We also offer the full range of complimentary services from strategy to writing, photography, illustration and printing.  
 
Our promise: a complete and flexible offer of services, comprehensive understanding and vision, intelligent and relevant design, precise execution, conformity to budgets and schedules, fruitful collaboration, and solid results. 
 
At Primeau Barey my main responsibility is graphic production, including typography, page layout and web design.
